Hey peeps.
I downloaded and installed the Server on VMware. when i powered it on, it's requiring a password for the administrator account and I never created one...help? :(
@loney64 try pressing enter and setting a pass ;)
Works like a charm on an old server i had laying around. Windows Update works without a problem.

Hoodboy:
Thank you. I am sure a lot of work went into the production.
You mentioned that, "it has just one problem - its huge size". I thought it might be just related to the installed files, but my experience in trying to burn a CD-R (using Nero) is that I get a message that the burned image is too large and it will not burn.
I tried to put it onto a DVD, but Nero complained that it must be burned on a CD.
So, the question: How does one manage to burn a CD from the .ISO?
Thank you from what i've read it work good ... hope so .. looks like you put alot a work into it
